text:
Since Khloé Kardashian and Tristan Thompson started dating in 2016, the couple has been consistently on-again, off-again. While the pair is not together anymore following the news that Tristan fathered a child with Maralee Nichols, things are said to be “okay” between the reality star and NBA player. According to reports, their focus is primarily on “co-parenting” their four-year-old daughter, True Thompson, who they welcomed in 2018, and the new baby boy they welcomed in August. If you’re having trouble keeping track of all their highs and lows and drama, here is a complete timeline of Khloé and Tristan’s relationship.



October 6, 2022: Khloé Explains Why She Won't Hold a Grudge Against Tristan

Khloé is officially moving on. The reality star opened up about how she's managed to maintain such a positive and optimistic outlook after the turmoil she experienced throughout her on-again, off-again relationship with Tristan. During the most recent episode of Hulu's The Kardashians, Khloé said, "It's probably, maybe, practice." The Good American mogul added, "I think a lot of people maybe forget that I've been through a lot of BS. My ex-husband [Lamar Odom], when we were married, definitely had a very public drug problem and was found in a brothel, and there was a lot of things that probably aren't forgivable, and I'm still able to forgive him and move on and want the best for him." According to Khloé, she plans to keep the same energy with Tristan. "It only hurts me by holding onto all this stuff, so let it go," Khloé said. "Let go and let God."

September 30, 2022: Khloé and Tristan Are “Not on Speaking Terms”

It’s been about two month since Khloé and Tristan welcomed their second child via surrogate, and one KarJenner insider told E! News that their current relationship is strictly about being co-parents.

“They are currently not on speaking terms,” the source shared with the outlet. When they do communicate, it’s “coordinating for the kids.” This update follows the news that back in 2021, Khlo and Tristan were engaged for nine months. Their engagement ended around the time that Tristan’s paternity scandal hit the headlines, and as we see it currently play out on The Kardashians season 2, the couple was officially off-again.

September 30, 2022: Khloé Was Secretly Engaged to Tristan for 9 Months After Rejecting First Proposal

According to People, the proposal Khloé had initially turned down occurred in December 2019. An anonymous source told the publication that the on-again, off-again couple had rekindled "despite lingering concerns about Tristan's infidelity." The basketball player had proposed to Khloé a second time around February 2021, and she accepted.

People reports that Khloé's sister, Kim, alluded to the "squishy timeline" of Tristan's proposals in the latest episode of The Kardashians. "I'll never forget Tristan calling me and he was gonna propose to her on Valentine's Day, which was a year since they had drama so this was last Valentine's Day," she said. "And then I called him the day after and I was like, 'Hey, I never heard anything from Khloé. Oh my god, did you propose?' and he was like, 'Oh yeah, I did in December.' Oh my God, she didn't tell us!"

September 29, 2022: Khloé Reveals That Tristan Proposed... and She Turned Him Down

On the most recent episode of , Khloé revealed that Tristan proposed to her back in December 2020. Not only did she turn him down, but she never told anyone until much, much later.

“The fact that he proposed and you never told us, and I asked him months later,” Kim pointedly explained, as she recalled the NBA player telling her, "Oh, I did it months ago. She didn’t tell you guys?"

If you've been tracking with Khloé and Tristan's timeline for a while now, you might have connected the dots and realized that his pregnancy scandal with Maralee Nichols happened around the exact same time as his secret proposal to Khloé. And if you're wondering why Tristan was rejected, it was because Khloé didn't feel "proud" to be receiving his offer.

“I need to make sure this is a totally different relationship because I want to be proud to say I’m engaged to anyone and that’s why I said I’m not comfortable accepting this right now because I’m not excited to tell my family," she confessed. “As hurtful as that probably was for him to hear it was the truth. I’m not ever gonna accept something and give someone false hope.”

September 22, 2022: Khloé Kardashian Reveals Baby No. 2 on The Kardashians

The premiere of The Kardashians came through with plenty of Khloé/Tristan/baby drama, with the season picking up right where we left off. What no one (including the sisters) knew at the time was that Khloé and Tristan had already gone through with embryo transfer to have a second baby via surrogacy when the news of Tristan's child with another woman came out.

Through the emotional episode, the KarJenners rallied behind Khloé, helping her prepare for the new addition with a baby shower. But some of the sisters couldn't help but comment on the situation, with Kylie Jenner slamming Khloé's baby daddy.

In a confessional, Kylie said, "I'm just really disappointed in Tristan. I think it's really f--ked up that he knew he had another baby on the way with somebody else, which makes me uncomfortable to put someone in that position, especially when there's a child involved."

She added, "This was just really unforgivable in my books."

The drama did have a happy ending, with the new mom of two FaceTiming friends and family from the hospital following her son's birth. "Ever since December, it's been this dark cloud looming over me. Every single day, I've been feeling depressed and sad, and now that my son is here, I get to move on, and I get to enjoy. It's almost like I get to close that chapter and be done with this trauma and put it behind me," she said.

"Now I finally get to start the healing process. Now I get to start enjoying my life with two kids in it and figuring this out. This is gonna be day one, and this is gonna be the start of something positive, and happy and beautiful."

HULU

September 11, 2022: Khloé and Tristan Risk a Run-In at Beyoncé's Birthday Party

Awk! Tristan and Khloé both attended Bey's star-studded 41st birthday festivities, along with Lizzo, MGK and Megan Fox, Lily-Rose Depp, and plenty of other A-List celebs.

It's unclear whether the exes and co-parents attended the party together or not, but they did arrive and leave the disco-themed party separately. Tristan looked unbothered by the paparazzi in an unbuttoned yellow printed shirt and black sunglasses, while Khloé hid her face behind voluminous '70s waves and blocked the paparazzi's view with a glittering purse that matched her sparkly, disco-ready ensemble. It's awkward, but we, too, would do anything for Beyoncé — including going to a party with an ex.

August 30, 2022: Khloé Speaks About Baby No. 2 With Tristan Thompson

It's been three weeks since Khloé welcomed a son with Tristan via surrogate, and The Kardashians star is ready to speak about her experience with motherhood amid the drama with her baby daddy.

When asked in an interview with ELLE how she's doing "as a mom of two," Khloe said, "I know it's cliché, but I love everything, even the hard parts."

She said her kids "challenge me as a person," and that "being able to shape little people into really incredible big people is an honor and a gift."

Khloe continued, "We have to take those roles seriously, especially in today's day and age, with how much accessibility children have and the information they're exposed to so young. It's super scary, but I take my job very seriously. I love it so much."

August 27, 2022: Malika Haqq Says Khloé Is Doing “About as Well as You Could Expect”

It’s been almost one month since news broke that Khloé and Tristan welcomed a son via surrogate, and during an appearance on the , Khlo’s bestie Malika Haqq gave some insight into how the reality star is getting along.

“I think she’s doing about as well as you could expect for someone in her circumstances,” she told host Carlos King, per People.

Malika continued to say that Khloé is “not the first woman to ever endure adversity in a relationship or be forgiving... but there are some glory times that are really meant to just be glory times. And some of that has been stripped from her, and it’s sad, but she really is one of the strongest people I know.”

“She’s got a good head on her shoulders. Faith is something else, and she’s got a great deal of it. I'll tell you that much. ’Cause this ain’t easy,” she added. “It’s not easy for me to watch, so I know it’s not easy for her.”

August 11, 2022: Sources Reveal Khloé and Tristan's Custody Agreement

According to an insider who spoke exclusively to Hollywood Life, Khloé and Tristan have already figured out how they want to co-parent their brand new son who is only days old.

“Khloé and Tristan have agreed that Khloé will have sole legal and physical custody of their baby full time. However, Tristan is so excited to have welcomed a son because he really wanted another boy. Even though Khloé will have full custody of the baby, she’s more than happy for Tristan to be present in their child’s life as much as he wants,” the source revealed.

They continued, telling Hollywood Life that Khloé was in the hospital while the surrogate gave birth while Tristan was with True at a gymnastic center in Los Angeles. "Khloé isn’t worried whether or not Tristan decides to be there for his baby, because she has a village of support around her. But Tristan has definitely taken an interest in being a very present father to his son and couldn’t be happier for the baby," the insider shared.

Tristan took to Instagram to share a cryptic message in response to the custody news. He posted a photo of himself, writing "I never switched sides, I switched lanes. I got wiser and realize we aren't all built the same 🗣🗣👀 #DontTryMe" in the caption. Interesting — wonder what he's referring to? Tristan, our DMs are open if you want to give us some context clues...

August 7, 2022: Khloé and Tristan Welcome Their Son

True is officially a big sister. People announced that Khloé Kardashian and Tristan Thompson welcomed their second child together via a surrogate. The former couple (who are focused on co-parenting) have yet to confirm the arrival of their baby boy publicly or announce what his name is.

As reports of Khloé and Tristan's new addition circulated online, news of Kim Kardashian's breakup with Pete Davidson surfaced as well.

July 24, 2022: Tristan and Khloé Post Cryptic Messages on Instagram

The couple is back at it with the mind games, and we have a front-row seat — Tristan Thompson took to Instagram Stories to share a message that seemed to be a subtle dig at his baby momma. “1. Nothing is promised to you. 2. No one owes you anything. 3. You have all responsibility in your life,” the graphic read. “Understand these three rules as early as possible and realize that independence is the way forward.”

@realtristan13 on Instagram

At almost the exact same time, Khloé shared a long message on her IG stories that had fans wondering what was happening behind the scenes with the on-and-off pair. “Be thankful that you don't already have everything you desire...If you did, what would there be to look forward to. Be thankful when you don't know something...For it gives you the opportunity to learn. Be thankful for the difficult times. During those times you grow. Be thankful for your limitations. Because they give you opportunities for improvement,” the reality star wrote.

@khloekardashian on Instagram

"It is easy to be thankful for the good things," the two-part message continued. "A life of rich fulfillment comes to those who are also thankful for the setbacks. GRATITUDE can turn a negative into a positive. Find a way to be thankful for your troubles and they can become your blessings."

Oof. We hope you’re figuring things out offline, Khloé and Tristan!

July 20, 2022: Khloé and Tristan's Daughter True Is "Excited" To Become a Big Sister

Khloé and Tristan are expecting their second child together, and their four-year-old daughter True couldn't be more "excited." A source close to the couple told Entertainment Tonight, "True is so beyond thrilled about becoming a big sister." According to the source, True "has been asking for a sibling for a long time and is so excited." Aww!

July 19, 2022: Khloé Likes an Instagram Post Supporting Tristan

Does Khloé approve of Tristan’s other woman? The reality star is seemingly okay following the video of her baby daddy in Greece with a mystery brunette — in fact, Khloé double-tapped a post from a fan account defending her ex’s actions.

@Kardashiansocial posted the video of Tristan with an unnamed woman in Mykonos that had Kardashian fans shook, captioning it in his defense. “To everyone that’s freaking out about this video of Tristan in Greece with another girl, Khloe and Tristan are both single and according to the statement from Khloe’s rep, they haven’t spoken since December besides coparenting so I don’t know why it would be crazy for Tristan to be with another girl as long as he’s a good dad to his baby which we don’t know when Khloe’s surrogate is due,” writes the fan account.

We don’t know exactly what Khloé’s intentions were when she liked that post, although she seems to be fine with her ex’s newest fling. The reality star hasn’t publicly commented on the situation, choosing instead to share a sweet snap of herself and her daughter, True, on Instagram. “Me and my best girl making the best memories. I will forever have your back my angel girl 🤍,” she wrote.

July 17, 2022: Tristan Holds Hands With a New Woman

Days after reports confirmed that Tristan Thompson and Khloé Kardashian were expecting their second child together, a son to be born via a surrogate, the NBA star was spotted holding hands with another woman. TMZ obtained footage of Tristan walking hand-in-hand with a mystery woman in Mykonos, Greece, around 5 AM on Sunday morning. According to the outlet, this wasn't the first night Tristan enjoyed female company during his vacation. On Friday, Tristan reportedly partied at club Bonbonniere, where video footage captured the expectant father surrounded by several women.

July 14, 2022: Khloé and Tristan Will Co-Parent Their New Baby

More details are coming out about Khloé Kardashian and Tristan Thompson's plans for raising their unborn child, who will be delivered via surrogate. According to People, Khloé wants Tristan "as involved as possible." A source told the outlet, "Just like they do with True, Khloé will co-parent the baby with Tristan."

While the former couple is no longer dating, Khloé "doesn't see herself as a single mom." The insider revealed that the Good American founder "feels very lucky" to have a "great support system with a lot of help."

July 13, 2022: Khloé and Tristan Are Having A Baby Boy Together via Surrogate

It looks like True is going to be a big sister! According to a report by TMZ, the on-again, off-again couple is having a second baby together via surrogate. Multiple sources told the outlet that their baby is on the way if it hasn't "already been born in the last day or so." A source also revealed to Page Six that Khloé and Tristan's second child is a boy.

One of Khloé's reps confirmed to Entertainment Tonight that the baby was conceived in November 2021. "Khloé is incredibly grateful to the extraordinary surrogate for such a beautiful blessing. We'd like to ask for kindness and privacy so that Khloé can focus on her family," the rep said. Based on the timing of the surrogate's pregnancy, it seems that Khloé and Tristan decided to go for baby #2 before their most recent breakup and latest cheating allegations that closed out the first season of Hulu's The Kardashians.

Related Story How Khloé and Tristan's Baby News Was Leaked

"The two have long said they wanted True to have a sibling, and Khloé even told her family she'd do it without Tristan if she needed to," an anonymous source told ET. "However, when the two were on good terms they decided to move forward with surrogacy near the end of last year, and then Tristan was caught cheating. The two aren't together and Khloé will have the baby full time, but Khloé wants Tristan in both the kids' lives as much as he wants to be."

Another anonymous source told the outlet that outside of co-parenting True, Khloé and Tristan have not spoken since December.

July 8, 2022: TikTok Catches Khloé Thanking Tristan for Birthday Flowers in a Deleted Instagram Story

A savvy TikTok user just caught the most recent turn of events in the long saga that is Tristan and Khloé’s relationship — apparently, the NBA player sent his ex (and baby mama) a birthday flower arrangement that she thanked him for on Instagram…before promptly deleting the tag.

Hannah Kosh (@hannahkosh) posted a screenshot of Khloé’s now-deleted Instagram story of pink peonies on a dining table with the words “Thank you,” zooming in on Tristan’s Instagram username tagged in the corner of the post. The photo was later reuploaded sans Tristan’s tag.

“Girl pleasee i can’t keep defending her” wrote one TikTok user. Another commented, “if this woman don’t let this man GO.” So, was that a purposeful ~move~ to show Tristan she was removing his tag, or did we witness some real time posting regret? We may never know...

@khloekardashian on Instagram

June 19, 2022: Khloé Addresses Paparazzi Photos of Her and Tristan

Over the weekend, paparazzi photos of Khloé, Tristan, and True circulated around the Internet — the first public photos of the exes since Tristan's paternity scandal in early January. Per Page Six, the images show the three exiting a restaurant with momager Kris Jenner, presumably following True's dance recital, which Khloé posted about on Instagram.

According to the published photos, it appears that the four shared an intimate lunch together, but Khloé quickly set the record straight on Instagram. Under a post about the outing on a fan account, the reality star commented, "Hummmm Very calculated of the paparazzi to not release photos of my other sisters and the fathers of their children Kim/Kanye Kylie/Trav." The account @commentsbycelebs also captured Khloé's response.

Instagram

She also took to the social media app to address rumors about her dating life, which also started to spread over the weekend. In a post from another fan account, a screenshot from DeuxMoi speculates that Khloé has moved on and is dating an NBA player. However, she shut all the rumors down in the comments. "Definitely NOT True !!! I love you! Thank you for the nice wishes but I am not seeing a soul," she wrote. "I am happy focusing on my daughter and myself for awhile."

June 16, 2022: Khloé Reacts to News of Tristan’s Paternity Scandal On The Kardashians

Khloé Kardashian spoke out about how she discovered that her on-again, off-again boyfriend of nearly five years, Tristan Thompson, fathered a child with Maralee Nichols while they were together. "I find out what Tristan is doing with the rest of the world," the Good American creator said. "A courtesy would be not doing it, but fine if you do it, you're not even going to give me a f*cking heads up before the rest of the world? It's just an additional slap in my face. It's humiliating. I'm embarrassed."

Clips of the couple and their 4-year-old daughter True emerged on the screen as Khloé said, "I'm replaying every event, every grand gesture, every trip, every date, every whatever. All of that was a lie." "When things happen to you a couple of times, you do kind of become immune to them, which is really sad."

Khloé later revealed Tristan's plans to move in with her and their daughter. "This house was supposed to be mine and Tristan and True's home that we were supposed to have our family in." It's really disappointing, and it's heartbreaking." "I wanted to believe that Tristan could change. I wanted to trust him and to believe that True and I were worth him changing for, but that's just life. Things just don't always go the way that we hope and plan."

May 9, 2022: "The Kardashians" Executive Producer Details Moment Khloé Discovered Tristan's Paternity Scandal

The Kardashians on Hulu is five episodes in and we've already witnessed some major moments unfold in the Kar-Jenner's lives. Kim hosted SNL, Kravis got engaged, Kendall and Scott get into an explosive fight — the list goes on, and it appears there is certainly more to come.

Ahead of the show's fifth episode debut, executive producer Danielle King spoke to US Weekly about what exactly was going on behind the scenes during filming. And it turns out, cameras were rolling when Khloé discovered that Tristan had fathered a child with Maralee Nichols.

"Well for that particular moment, my crew was there. We were there to film something else early in the morning and the morning that news broke, we legitimately just happened to be there. We have that moment on camera," she revealed. "And I know sometimes it's tough for the audience to kind of grasp like 'Oh, did they go back and did they capture this?' But there were so many moments that we genuinely captured just because we're almost always there. There's almost always a camera going."

"Our story goes in a completely different direction sometimes," she continued. "We might be going there to shoot one thing, and then I'm usually like 'Oh OK, I didn't see this coming but here we go.'"

The EP didn't disclose the specific episode that we see this heartbreaking scene unfold, but we do know that Tristan confessed that he had a child with Maralee in January, and The Kardashians is currently airing the events that happened around Thanksgiving. So, it's likely it'll occur in a couple more episodes.

May 8, 2022: Tristan Sends Kris Jenner Mother's Day Flowers

Khloé and Tristan are done for good — as the reality star confirmed last month — but it appears the NBA player still keeps close with his ex's family. On Sunday, May 8, Tristan sent a pink-and-white arrangement of roses to Kardashian matriarch Kris Jenner for Mother's Day. The momager uploaded a snap of the colorful bouquet on her Instagram Story, tagging and thanking Tristan. "Thank you @realtristan13!!! Love you 💖," she wrote.

Instagram

.

Despite their split, Khloé and Tristan continue to co-parent their four-year-old daughter True. In her interview with ABC's Robin Roberts in April, Khloé shared, "I still think he's a great guy, and he's a great dad. He's just not the guy for me."

April 6, 2022: Khloé opens us about her relationship with Tristan

Khloé Kardashian is officially moving on after her relationship with NBA star Tristan Thompson. The Good American mogul appeared in an interview with Robin Roberts, where she opened up about how her relationship began with Tristan, what made her look past his initial infidelity, and where she stands with him now. The Sacramento Kings star was involved in multiple cheating scandals and fathered a son with another woman while he was dating Khloé.



"With Tristan, I did feel incredibly safe in the beginning and I felt really good for a time," she began. "I remember when he cheated on me right before I gave birth and I was able to still have him in the delivery room," she explained. "So yes, it might have looked strange to the outside world, but when my daughter watches my home videos, those videos are going to be as pure and perfect as I was able to make them."

The on-again-off-again couple managed to work through serious challenges in the past, but Khloé admitted that romantically, they're over for good. "I still think he's a great guy, and he's a great dad. He's just not the guy for me."

She also discussed what she and the rest of her siblings are looking for in their future partners and relationships. "I think at the end of the day, all of us aspire to have blissfulness," Khloé said. "We want to feel happy, we want to feel safe."

March 9, 2022: Khloé gives her first interview since Tristan's paternity scandal

It's been a little over two months since Tristan Thompson admitted that he fathered a child with Maralee Nichols. Now, in a new interview profile with Variety, Khloé has opened up for the very first time about the cheating scandal — and confirmed that she will address the painful situation in the Kar-Jenner's new Hulu series, The Kardashians.

"I wish I never had to talk about that because it’s not a fun thing to talk about," Khloé shared. "But it is part of my journey in life, so we will see it on the show."



February 8, 2022: Tristan shares an adorable post with True

Tristan Thompson recently spent quality time with his three-year-old daughter, True. The daddy-daughter duo was all smiles as Tristan sat True in his lap in an adorable photo he shared to his Instagram Story. The NBA star kept things short and sweet, simply adding two red heart emojis to the pic.

Instagram

January 21, 2022: Tristan makes a post about facing "demons"

Tristan Thompson took to social media with a cryptic message. The Sacramento Kings star opened up about facing "demons" after a DNA test confirmed that he fathered his third child while he was publicly dating Khloé Kardashian.

"Sometimes you don't realize your own strength until you face your greatest weakness," he wrote on his Instagram Story. "Hide from your demons and they'll slowly destroy your potential. Face them and they can potentially become your greatest asset."

Tristan Thompson // Instagram

January 19, 2022: Khloé's family is reportedly helping her get through Tristan's cheating scandal

Khloé Kardashian is reportedly leaning on her mother Kris Jenner for support after Tristan Thompson was proven to have fathered a child while they were publicly dating. According to People, the reality star is having a "tough time accepting the paternity drama."

A source claims, "Khloé is really struggling with what's happening with Tristan." Her mother has been a source of strength during her tough time. "She's leaning heavily on Kris all of the time. But Kris wants Khloé and Tristan to be in a good place so she's encouraging Khloé to keep the lines of communication open."

The source claims the reality star is "so upset" because she "wanted the fairytale life" with the NBA baller. "People around her have never seen her so down and are so thankful she has her mother there who has barely left her side," the source said.

January 12, 2022: Sources share where Khloé and Tristan stand following paternity confession

Khloé Kardashian has yet to publicly address Tristan Thompson's apology for fathering a child with Maralee Nichols while they were rumored to have still been dating. According to Page Six, the reality star is "taking the high road," and privatively let Tristan "know she appreciated the message."

A source told the outlet, "While she will never, ever get back with him, Khloé really wants Tristan to be a good father to [their daughter] True, and for him to be a big part of their daughter's life."

The source revealed that Khloé's priority is making sure True "has a good relationship with her dad... So for that reason, Khloé is not going to fight with Tristan or block him from the family."



January 3, 2022: Tristan Thompson confirms he fathered a child while dating Khloe Kardashian

Tristan Thompson is officially a new dad. The NBA star took to his Instagram Story, where he confirmed that he is indeed the father of a son with Maralee Nichols. Along with admitting paternity, Tristan took "full responsibility" for his actions and apologized to his ex-girlfriend, Khloe Kardashian, who he was reportedly dating at the time his son was conceived.

"Today, paternity test results reveal that I fathered a child with Maralee Nichols," the Sacramento Kings center-forward wrote. "I take full responsibility for my actions. Now that paternity has been established I look forward to amicably raising our son."

He continued with a message for those hurt by his actions. "I sincerely apologize to everyone I've hurt or disappointed throughout this ordeal both publicly and privately."

Tristan Thompson // Instagram

Tristan followed up with a separate post to Khloé writing, 'You don't deserve this. You don't deserve the heartache and humiliation I have caused you. You don't deserve the way I have treated you over the years." He added, "My actions certainly have not lined up with the way I view you. I have the utmost respect and love for you. Regardless of what you may think. Again, I am so incredibly sorry."

Tristan Thompson // Instagram

Khloé has yet to speak out following news of Tristan's new son.

December 17, 2021: Maralee Nichols makes her first public statement after her paternity suit against Tristan Thompson goes public

Maralee Nichols has come forward amid reports of her paternity suit against Tristan Thompson. She provided a statement to E! News to address the "fake stories," "unflattering photos," and incorrect reports about her occupation and age.

"There have been multiple fake Instagram posts claiming to be me, making false statements and attaching stock photos of a sonogram and a child (neither mine)," she told E! News.

Maralee, who said she met Tristan during a party at his Encino, California, home in 2020, continued, "These are the facts: I have lived in California since 2019. I am not a personal trainer. I have not worked as a personal trainer for four years; I do fitness modeling. I was never a personal trainer for Tristan."

She revealed that she saw the NBA star on his Birthday and "agreed to meet him in Houston at a private party on March 12." The fitness model claims she and Tristan spent "many nights" together after his birthday and she even visited him in Boston. Maralee says she discovered she was pregnant and told Tristan the news when he flew her to North Carolina to see him at the end of April.

Maralee claims she did "everything possible" to stay out of the media during her pregnancy. According to the new mother, "Tristan filed a paternity action in Texas after I filed my paternity action in Los Angeles." She also addressed concerns over child support. "I did not file any request for child support before our child was born. The case that Tristan brought against me was dismissed on December 15, 2021."

She also opened up about her delivery and her plans going forward. "I was induced on November 29, 2021, because I had a placenta abnormality," she said. "There is no other medical reason why I needed to be induced. I gave birth on December 1, 2021. Instead of focusing on any negativity, I am choosing to embrace being a mother and doing the best I can for my son. I do not want any further media attention, nor do I want a romantic relationship with Tristan. My goal is to raise our son in a safe, healthy, loving, and private environment."

December 16, 2021: Paternity documents claim Tristan admitted to having a relationship with the woman accusing him of fathering her child

New details have emerged in Tristan Thompson's ongoing paternity suit with Maralee Nichols. According to court documents obtained by the Daily Mail, Tristan reportedly admitted to having a "sporadic" relationship with Maralee.

According to the court docs, Tristan "was very cautious" and "did not foresee that" he would have any type of relationship with Maralee after meeting her in late November or early December 2020. Tristan denied having sex with Maralee in California at that time, but he reportedly confirmed that the "only" possible date of conception for Maralee's child is March 13, 2021, which is his birthday. Per the docs, Maralee claims the child was conceived in April.

According to the docs, Tristan said, "We did not have any dates in the traditional sense at any time; there were no dining at restaurants, going to movies, traveling or any other indicia of a normalized relationship."

He later admitted that he and Maralee would discuss "where" and "what time" they would hook up on Snapchat, but denied sending the viral screenshots of a conversation where he was accused of saying that he would be unable to pay an extreme amount of child support because he'd be retiring from the NBA soon.



December 10, 2021: Khloé and Tristan are officially over

Khloé Kardashian and Tristan Thompson are reportedly "focused on co-parenting True" amid reports that the NBA star welcomed his third child with another woman. According to People, "Khloé is moving on." The former couple has allegedly been "broken up for a while and things are okay between them."

The source said that Khloe remained in a relationship with Tristan "because she always believed he would change," especially since they spent the COVID-19 lockdown together. together.

Details about Tristan's ongoing paternity lawsuit with Maralee Nichols have been sealed. According to PageSix, the filing no longer be found online. The records are reportedly listed as "currently confidential or this case has been sealed." The findings come days after Tristan reportedly filed a gag order to stop Maralee from engaging with the media about their case.
